div.h4: In front of the theater there is a big room with white walls, tables and chairs. Here, the audience usually waits. You want to find out ideas about how you make the room more fun for kids from 3rd to 4th grade to wait in. Therefore, you decide to create a brainstorm with Ella and Jacob from the theater.
div.h6: Write in the space below. Click "Enter", every time you have written an idea. While you are writing, you can see Ella and Jacob's ideas on the screen. Click the text in the big square, when you are ready to brainstorm. Go to the next task when you are done coming up with new ideas. You will automatically be sent to the next task after 3 minutes.
